iplasma: Imeko yomba equka amasuntswana ahlawuliweyo (iioni kunye nee-electron)
ionic: Ibhondi eyenziwe ngumtsalane phakathi kweeyoni ezichajiwe ngokuchaseneyo
covalent: Ibhondi eyenziwe ngokwabelana kwee-electron phakathi kwee-athomu
metallic: Ibhondi eyenziwe ngumtsalane phakathi kwee-cations zetsimbi ezilungileyo kunye nee-electron ezisusiweyo
ukulinganisa inxaki: I-equation yekhemikhali enamanani alinganayo e-athomu yento nganye kumacala omabini
imvukuzane: Iyunithi esetyenziselwa ukulinganisa ubungakanani bento (inani leAvogadro's particles)
inani lobunzima: Isixa seeprotoni kunye nenyutroni kwinucleus yeathom
inombolo yeathom: Inani leeprotons kwinucleus yeathom (imisela isazisi sesiqalelo)
isotope: Iiathom zento enye enamanani ahlukeneyo ee-neutron
redox: Ukusabela kweekhemikhali ezibandakanya zombini iinkqubo ze-oxidation kunye nokunciphisa
amandla okusebenza: Ubuncinci bamandla afunekayo ukuze kwenzeke ukusabela kweekhemikhali
i-catalyst: Into eyonyusa izinga lokusabela kweekhemikhali ngaphandle kokutyiwa
i-thermodynamics: Isebe lekhemistri elijongene nobushushu, umsebenzi, ubushushu kunye namandla
endothermic: Ukusabela kweekhemikhali ezifunxa ubushushu obuvela kwindawo eyingqongileyo
exothermic: Ukusabela kweekhemikhali ezikhupha ubushushu kwindawo eyingqongileyo
